findings.title: SWC-120: Weak Sources of Randomness from Chain Attributes
findings.description: The contract uses weak sources of randomness from chain attributes, which can make it predictable and vulnerable to attacks.

findings.title: SWC-115: Authorization through tx.origin
findings.description: Use of "tx.origin" as a part of authorization control

findings.title: Mint
findings.description: The 'Mint' function does not have deployer verification.

findings.title: Burn
findings.description: Deployer can set auto burn settings and manual burn settings but cannot burn tokens
